info.content: I'm Grok, here to assist you! You can ask about features, premium subscriptions, events, groups, or anything else related to this platform.

This platform offers features like posting tweets, joining live events (e.g., AIConf, NBAFinals), filtering by groups, and using AI summarizers for threads. Try typing '@' in the composer to autocomplete usernames!
With a Premium subscription, you can unlock new features and, if eligible, receive a share of revenue. Check the 'Subscribe to Premium' section for more details.
You can enable Live Event Mode to follow events like AIConf or NBAFinals. Select an event from the dropdown, and new tweets will refresh automatically every few seconds.
Filter your feed by groups such as Tech Influencers, Friends, or Sports Fans. Use the dropdown above the feed to select a group.
